data.text: Mahuku sita nihinaaya nihuku no Pasaka, Yesu ahorwaa Ubethaniya uwannyaya Nalazaro aahihimushiye ni Yesu ukhuma nnookhwani.
Wowo ahoterekelhiya yolhia yo uchechilho, yaaterekhiye ni Namatha, Nalazaro ni ayo ahokhalha vamezani vamoka ni Yesu.

Paahi etu Amariamu nkayaawia ntikha ilita yo makhura o unukhelha chinene o uhithakanihiya aathumihiya wo nchurukhu mwinchi, nkayanhika makhura Yesu mmietoni ni umpoholha wo ikharari chaya. Nihiriri nkanaachara mpaani mwonkhaye.
Yuda Isikariote, owiittucha mmoka aya khumi ni elhi, nohalha unthumiha Yesu, nkeera,
“Wo nlhatu waani etu alha makhura alha uhithumihiya wo nchurukhu idinari imia taaru, ni uvahiya amashikini?”
olhumanche chiicho, kuhena wiira anaachukulhelha amashikini, nansho ukhalhawaya aari ntu owiiya. Eiyaka munrupani mwo ushungelha nchurukhu weetana awe.
Nansho Yesu nkeera, “Nhaahuvihe amanyi alha! Mwaahiyeke akeesheke tayari wo nihuku naka no uvithiya.
Amashikini nnowaakhalhana mahuku onkhaye, nansho khannokhalha ni mii wo mahuku onkhaye.”

Attu enchi munlhokoni mwa Ayahudi nkayeewa wiira Yesu rii Ubethaniya, paahi etu, nkayaarwaa wowo, kuhiwe nansho wo nlhatu noomwona Yesu, nansho woona Nalazaro yaahihimushiye ni Yesu ukhuma nnookhwani.
Opochera ishaani olhupalhe nkayaapanga miruku cho weeva Nalazaro,
ukhalhawaya wo nlhatu naya Ayahudi enchi yahohiya weewelhelha, nkayanrumelhelha Yesu.
Waashelhe waya, milhoko chinchi cha attu chaawilhe usikuukuni chaheewa wiira Yesu aari mphironi uwa Uyerusalemu.
Paahi etu, nkayakushacha maritta o mitende, nkayaarwaa umwiikamelhani, akhuwelhaka eeraka,
Yesu nkaawiiheriya mwaaphuta mmoka, nkaawelha vachulhu vawe thoko chinohimiya aya ni Malhove Matakatifu,
“Nhoove iwani yo Sayuni!
Owiittucha awe yaari ahichuwelhaka yoyo mwaha uyo, nansho Yesu amalheke uthimichiya, phi opuwenlhe aya wiira Malhove Matakatifu yaholhepiya, amwaachaka wiira attu yahompangelha yayo.
Attu yaari vamoka ni Yesu nihuku yeehanne awe Nalazaro ukhuma nnihiyeni, aahihimushaka ukhuma nnookhwani, yahonhimiechesha.
Nenno etu phi nlhatu no wiikamelhiya ni nlhoko mwinchi wa attu, ukhalhawaya yaheewa wiira Yesu ahopanga yeyo yo ushangiha iyo.
Paahi, Amafarisayo nkayeerelhana, “Nnowoona vano? Khaninooria upanga ittu iriyoothe! Mmweheke, ilhapo yonkhaye inonttwara!”
Ahokhalha Ayunani mumphingoni mwa attu yaarwelhe Uyerusalemu uuthimichani nihuku no Pasaka nno.
Nkayarwaa u Nafilipo, anenchi o Ubethsaida yo Galilaya, ni wiira, “Pwiiya, ninothanana umwoona Yesu.”
Nafilipo nkayaarwaa, nkayeerelha Naandorea, ni ayo oyelhi nkayaarwaa unhimeriani Yesu.
Yesu nkeera, “Isaa yo uthimichiya Mwaana a Ntu ihophiya!
Ikekheene kinouhimeriani, imbeyu yo marupi inohalha imbeyuru yaahimoreke vattayani ni ukhwa. Yakhwaaka, phi noyara aya marupi menchi.
Attu anottuna ukumi aya anoopoteriha, anovenga makhalhelho o ukumi wo velhaponi va, anoshungerera wo nlhatu wo ukumi wo mahuku o uhimalha.
Ntu nothanana ukikaviha ntheko, hothananiya ukittwara, ikhalhe wiira variyoothe variaka miyaano ni akarumiya aka anottuna ukhalha vavawo. Ntu nokikaviha, Athumwanaka anonvaha nthimicho.
“Vano nnepa aka unoohuperia, ni mii kuulhumachekeni etu? Chani kiire, ‘Thithi, nkoopolhe ilha ikatema ilha ihikiphiyelhe?’ Nansho phi nlhatu wo uwa waka, wiira kivire ilha ikatema yo uweria ilha.
Thithi, nthimicheke vano nchina ninyu.” Vavawo nlhove nkaneewaniaa ukhuma wiirimu, “Kihothimicha, ni vavawo kinoothimicha tho.”
Attu yaari aneemenlhe vavawo yaheewa nenno nlhove nno, ni attu akina aya nkaanyihera ithari nansho akina aya nkayolhumacha, “Nnepa wo wiirimu uholhumacha umuulhumana!”
Nansho Yesu nkeerelha, “Nenno nlhove nno khaniiwanelhe wo nlhatu aka miyaano, ila wo nlhatu ninyu.
Vanova phi ikatema yo uhukumulhiya ilhapo, vanova Nakare nholhelhi o ilhapo ilha noopikhulhiya.
Ni mii kennulhiyaka vachulhu ilhapo kinommwiiha kila ntu uwannyaka.”
Wo wulhumacha chiicho ahooniha naakhweke nookhwa ani.

Paahi yoyo nlhoko uyo nkawaamwaakhulha, “Hiyaano ninoohimeriya ni Malhehero ihu wiira Kuristo khaawa aakhwa nookhalha nkumi mahuku o uhimalha. Nnooria chani etu wiira, Mwaana a Ntu nowiinulhiya? Yoyo Mwaana a Ntu uyo phi mpani?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Nthuko bado urii ni inyu wo mahuku vakani. Mweeteke nnari ni yoyo nthuko uyo ipiphi ihuupatteni, ukhalhawaya aneeta mpiiphini khanochuwelha unokelha aya.
Paahi etu, ikatema nnari ni yoyo nthuko uyo nrumelhelheke nkhalhe attu o nthuko.”
Anakhalhaka Yesu ahopangacha cho ushangiha chonkhaye chiyo yoonaka, khayaanrumelhenlhe.
Chiichammo etu malhove yoolhumanche aya anamilhohi ashinna Isaya nkayatimira,
Chiicho khayoonrie urumelhelha, ukhalhawaya ashinna Isaya yahoolhumacha tho wiira,
“Nlhuku hotiyelhelha miitho aya ahoone,
Ashinna Isaya yoolhumanche yayo malhove ayo ukhalhawaya yahoona nthimicho wa Yesu, nkayaahimiacha mwaha wawe.

Hata chiicho, aholhelhi enchi Ayahudi yahonrumelhelha Yesu. Nansho wo nlhatu ni Amafarisayo, khayolhumanche mwaha wo unrumelhenlha Yesu voonene, yaari yoovaka wiira anowoomolhiya nnupani mwo unlhapelha Nlhuku.
Yaathanana uthimichiya ni attu kuhiwe utotopelhiya ni Nlhuku.
Yamalhekeru Yesu nkaawelhiha nlhove nkaahimia wiira, “Ntu nokirumelhelha, khanokirumelhelha mii tu, ila nowaarumelhelha ni ayo akirumme.
Attu anokoona miyaano anoowona akirumme.
Miyaano kiwiilhe velhaponi kikhalhe nthuko, attu onkhaye anokirumelhelha ahihalhe mwiipiphini.
Ntu neewa malhove aka nansho wo uhivarelhelha, miyaano khakinonhukumulha, ukhalhawaya khakiwilhe uhukumulhani ilhapo nansho woopolhani attu o velhaponi.
Attu ahinovarelhelha malhove aka ahana ntu mmoka owahukumulha. Nlhove nuulhumachilhe aka phinottuna waahukumulha nihuku no umalhelha!
Miyaano khakuulhumanche wo ikuru aka kimwanene, Athithi akilhehenre malheheriyo ayo phi kivanhe yo wulhumacha.
Ni mii kinoochuwelha wiira malhehero aya anoowiha ukumi wo uhimalha. Paahi etu, miyaano kinohimiacha Athithi akilheehenre aya.”
